title: Flight Simulator - How to - A320 V2 - manually planning your flight
description:
This video will guide you through the manual setup of the flight plan in the A320 V2, introduced in Sim Update 15. We'll begin by examining the operational flight plan, emphasizing the elements crucial for setting up the flight plan. Subsequently, we'll detail the various steps necessary to establish the flight plan in the MCDU.

0:00 intro
0:10 the operational flight plan (OFP)
3:07 setting the departure runway and standard instrumental departure (SID )
5:55 adding airways to the flight plan
11:00 adding waypoints
16:17 removing a waypoint
17:30 setting the arrival runway and standard terminal arrival route (STAR) and approach
20:15 seeing the flight plan in the navigation display (ND)
